definition: Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: They might be separated by ten thousand miles, but there would always be the bond between them.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以远隔万里，但他们之间永远有了交契。

sentences.english: It was a beautiful, cloudless sunny day at the end of summer.

sentences.english: The Great Wall of China is one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国的万里长城是世界奇观之一。

sentences.english: Reducing the number of HTTP requests in your page is the place to start.

sentences.english: The weather this morning is sunny with bright sunshine and a cloudless blue sky.

sentences.english: Part six deals with the appraisal of Yang Wanli's Yi-ology.

sentences.english: Bird is like clouds hang down the wings, although nine miles can also soared.

definition: a thousand miles/a thousand li (i.e. 500 kilometers)/a long distance
the other end of the world/a faraway place
